pages.title: Trades
pages.text: The Instrumentalist may trade the following items depending on their level:$(br)$(li)$(l)Level 1$() - Minecraft Cat or 13 Disc, Note Block$(br)$(li)$(l)Level 2$() - Random Handheld Instrument, Switchboard, Floppy Disk$(br)$(li)$(l)Level 3$() - Random Block Instrument, FileCaster, Transmitter, Broadcaster
$(li)$(l)Level 4$() - Random Handheld Instrument, Random MIMI Machine$(br)$(li)$(l)Level 5$() - Random Block Instrument, Random Minecraft Music Disc (except 'Otherside'), Disc Fragment
